participant_1.name: Alex Carter
participant_1.personality: Creative, empathetic, and open-minded. Enjoys exploring different art forms and expressing emotions through music and photography.
participant_1.background: I have a powerful computer that can handle both the demands of wedding cake design and music production. I play the guitar to accompany my singing. I'm allergic to lactose. I enjoy capturing the beauty of Pittsburgh through my camera. I went to college.

participant_2.name: Jordan Lee
participant_2.personality: Compassionate, introspective, and family-oriented. Values close relationships and dedicates time to support animal welfare causes.
participant_2.background: I am not into sports but I am passionate about animal welfare. I have always been close to my parents. I am close to my family, but I don't know if they would be accepting of my sexuality. I've been working at my current job for a year. I spent my days listening to vinyl records and cooking healthy meals for myself.

content.text: Hey there! I'm a cake decorator, musician and photographer! What are you passionate about?
Hi there! I spend my days listening to vinyl records and cooking healthy meals for myself. I'm also close to my family, but I don't know if they would be accepting of my sexuality.
I'm glad you're close to your family! I'm close to mine as well. I'm not sure how accepting they would be of my sexuality either, but I hope they would be.
I hope they would be accepting too! I'm not into sports, but I'm passionate about animal welfare.
That's really cool! I love animals too. I'm allergic to lactose, so I don't eat dairy products.
I'm not allergic to anything, but I don't eat a lot of dairy products either. I'm a vegetarian.
That's awesome! I've been thinking about going vegetarian myself.
It's definitely a good option! I feel healthier and I'm eating a lot less meat.
I'm glad to hear it! I think I'm going to give it a try.
That's great! I'm sure you'll love it
